jamesclient 0.14.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Download results from ocpu server as a list

Source: R/download_as_list.R
download_as_list.Rd

Obtains thecontents of one or more url's from the OpenCPU server response in a list.

download_as_list(resp, pattern = "R/.val")

Arguments

resp

An object of class httr::response(), typically returned by a previous call to httr::POST to the server.
pattern

A character vector with the trailing part of the requested url, e.g. "R/.val" or "stdout". Use "" to obtain all results.

Value

A list with the contents under the url's that match pattern. The result has length 0 if the pattern was not found.

Examples

file <- file.path(path.package("jamesclient"), "testdata", "client3.json")
resp <- upload_txt(file)

#> BDS 82 (Zwangerschapsduur in dagen): Buiten bereik 50-350
resp

#> Response [https://groeidiagrammen.nl/ocpu/library/james/R/fetch_loc]
#>   Date: 2021-05-12 19:18
#>   Status: 201
#>   Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
#>   Size: 326 B
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/R/.val
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/R/fetch_loc
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/messages
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/stdout
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/source
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/console
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/info
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/files/client3.json
#> /ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/files/DESCRIPTION
download_as_list(resp, pattern = "stdout")

#> $`/ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/stdout`
#> Response [https://groeidiagrammen.nl/ocpu/tmp/x0c1a20d4a0ab89/stdout/text]
#>   Date: 2021-05-12 19:18
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
#>   Size: 3.72 kB
#> An object of class "individual"
#> Slot "id":
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> Slot "name":
#> [1] "fa308134-069e-49ce-9847-ccdae380ed6f"
#> 
#> Slot "dob":
#> [1] "2018-10-11"
#> 
#> ...
#>
